      • toArray

        int[] toArray()
        Returns SIZE*SIZE elements array starting from first row, iterate through columns and go to next row.

        Matrix: 1,2,3 4,5,6 7,8,9

        Result: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9

        Returns:
